solution_line_template: His old apartment cost {old_apartment_sq_ft}*${old_rent_per_sq_ft}=${<<{old_apartment_sq_ft}*{old_rent_per_sq_ft}={old_monthly_rent}>>}{old_monthly_rent} a month
His new apartment cost ${new_apartment_cost_per_month}/{number_of_roommates}=${<<{new_apartment_cost_per_month}/{number_of_roommates}={new_monthly_rent_share}>>}{new_monthly_rent_share} a month
That means he saves ${monthly_savings}*{months_per_year}=${<<{monthly_savings}*{months_per_year}={annual_savings}>>}{annual_savings} a year
